name: Alien Hunter, Zombie Shooter
description:
Recent reports have confirmed that is an invasion of our galaxy. Aliens has commanded to all troops, monster, zombies to destroy the planet Mars. Soldier, tanks, robots is going to Mars to destroy alien invasion.

Zombie Shooting (Alien Shooter) is a fun and free arcade, action, 2d horizontal version shooting adventure game that's all about shooting zombies with tanks. Each level in Zombie Shooter is packed full of destructible objects and crazy zombie enemies. In game, you control a robot (tank) with a lot of gun, bullet, armor, skill, supporter, heavy machine, ... to destroy all alien, zombies wave.

You can collect golds, items, diamond, ... to upgrade your tank robots.

- GAME FEATURES :

+) A lot of tanks, with a lot of special skill and effect
+) Lots of aliens, zombies to fight
+) Game play retro and amazing
+) Simple controls which can be enjoyed by everyone
+) Best shooting game
+) Game play smooth, rich sound ....
